title: Gas Quality Check
description: A technician checks the quality of natural gas being received from a supplier to ensure it meets the utility's tariff specifications.

tasks.description: Use a portable gas chromatograph to take a sample of the gas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician successfully obtains a gas sample.

tasks.description: Analyze the sample to determine its composition and heating value (BTU content).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis provides the exact composition of the gas.

tasks.description: Compare the results to the specifications in the gas tariff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician confirms the gas quality is within the acceptable range.

tasks.description: Log the results in the gas management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician successfully logs the quality test results.
